name: GeometriCaos
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Is very easy to play; but could be a challenge destroy all the pentagons.

I hope you enjoy this simple game.

How to play?

To move circle use W, A, S, D keys or arrow keys.

Press left click mouse to shoot.

Warning! Remember that your own bullets can destroy you.

The circles can heal you.

The goal? Destroy 10 pentagons.
